meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent2: Oh blimey, I can't believe it!
meanings.sent3: Blimey, did you see that rabbit jump over the fence?
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky, blimey!
meanings.sent5: Blimey, the magician made the rabbit disappear in a puff of smoke!

meanings.definition: An exclamation of astonishment or disbelief.
meanings.sent1: Blimey! Is that a real dinosaur?
meanings.sent3: Blimey, I can't believe I won the lottery!
meanings.sent4: The size of that cake, blimey!
meanings.sent5: Blimey, the storm knocked down the entire tree!
